Translations.Text: mattu nivu nannobbananne aradhisabeku, aduve nera margavendu
avanu nim'malli bahu mandiyannu darigedisiddane. Nivenu bud'dhiyannu balasiralillave
iduve nimage vagdana madalagidda naraka
nivu (satyavannu) dhikkarisiddara pratiphalavagi indu idarolage pravesisiri
Indu navu avara (dhikkarigala) bayigalige mudre jadidiruvevu. Nam'modane avara kaigalu matanaduvavu mattu avaru enella madiddarendu avara kalugalu saksi heluvavu
navu bayasidare avara kannugalannu nuccu nurugolisi bidaballevu. A balika avaru dariyedege dhavisali. Avaru enannu tane kanaballaru
navu bayasidare, avaru iruvalle avara rupagalannu vikrtagolisi bidaballevu – a balika avarige munde hogalikku sadhyavagadu, maralalikku agadu
navu yarige dhirgha ayusyavannu koduttevo, avarannu racaneyalli (durbala sthitige) maralisi bidutteve. Avarenu buddiyannu balasuvudillave
navu avarige (dutarige) kavyavannu kalisilla. Adu avarige bhusanavu alla. Idu kevala ondu upadesavagide mattu spastavada kur‌an agide
jivantaviruva ellarannu avaru (dutaru) eccarisabekendu hagu dhikkarigala virud'dha saksavu purtiyagalendu (navu idannu kalisiruvevu)
avaru noduttillave, avaru malakaragiruva januvarugalannu navu avarigagi nam'ma kaiyare srstisiruvevu
navu avugalannu avarige vidheyagolisiruvevu. Avaru a paiki kelavannu savarigagi balasidare, kelavannu aharavagi balasuttare
avugalalli avarige halavu labhagalive, kudiyuva vastugalu ive. Istiddu avaru krtajnate toruvudillave
avaru allahana horatu itararinda tamage neravu dorakitendu avarannu tam'ma devaragisikondiddare
avaru ivarige neravagalu saktaralla. Adaru, ivaru avara munde dandugalante hajaraguttare
(dutare,) avara matugalinda nivu duhkhitaragabedi. Avaru bacciduva hagu prakata padisuva ellavannu navu ballevu
manusyanu kandillave, navu avanannu viryadinda srstisiruvudannu? Istagiyu avanu spasta jagalagantanagi bittiruvanu
Avanu nam'ma kuritu (eneno) holikegalannu kattuttane. Nijavagi avanu tanna jananavannu maretiddane. Elubugalu karagi hoda balika avugalannu yaru tane jivantagolisaballaru? Endu avanu prasnisuttane
heliri; avugalannu modala bari srstisidavane avugalannu matte srstisuvanu. Avanu ella bageya srsti karyavannu ballavanagiddane
avane, nimagagi hasiru maradinda benkiyannu utpadisidavanu, niviga adarindale benkiyannu urisuttiri
akasagalannu hagu bhumiyannu srstisidavanu ivaranthavarannu srstisalu asamarthane? Khandita alla. Avanantu, ellavannu balla, tajna srstikartanagiddane
avanu enannadaru madalu icchisidaga, adakke ‘agu’ endaste heluttane mattu astaralle adu agi bittiruttade
avanu pavananu, ella vastugala paramadhikaravu avana kaiyallide. (Konege) nim'mellarannu avanedege maralisalaguvudu
sistu bad'dhavagi salugattiruvavara (malak‌gala) ane
ugravagi gadarisuvavarane
upadesavannu oduvavarane
nim'ma aradhyanu khandita obbane
avanu akasagala, bhumiya hagu avugala naduve iruva ellavugala odeya mattu purvagala odeyanagiddane
khanditavagiyu navu bhulokada akasavannu naksatragala sobagininda alankarisiruvevu
mattu navu adannu pratiyobba vidrohi saitananinda raksisittiruvevu
melina lokada enannu kelisikollalu avarige sadhyavilla. Ella kadeyindalu avara mele praharavaguttade
avarannu bennatti him'mettisalaguttade. Allade avarige sasvata sikse ide
istagiyu kittukondu odidavanu – ondu uriyuva jvaleyu avana bennu hidiyuttade
nivu avarodane keli nodiri; avarannu srstisuvudu heccu kastavo athava nam'ma (itara) srstigalanno? Avarannantu navu antuva mannininda srstisiruvevu
(Dutare,) nivu (allahana mahimeya kuritu) accari paduttiri mattu avaru geli maduttare
avarige upadesisaladaga avaru upadesavannu svikarisuvudilla
avaru yavudadaru puraveyannu kandaga, adannu geli maduttare
mattu avaru, idu spastavada jadugarikeye horatu berenu alla endu biduttare
navu sattu mannagiyu elubugalagiyu marpatta balika nam'mannenu punah jivanta golisalaguvude
athava, nam'ma tata muttatandirannu kuda (jivantagolisalaguvude? Endu avaru prasnisuttare)
heliri, haudu, mattu nivu apamanitaraguviri
adu (lokantyada kahale) kevala ondu eccarikeya dhvaniyagiruvudu. Astaralle avaru dangagi noda todaguvaru
mattu avaru, ‘‘ayyo nam'ma dusthiti! Iduve a pratiphalada dina’’ ennuvaru
iduve, nivu nirakarisuttidda tirmanada dina
(andu malak‌galodane helalaguvudu;) ‘‘akramigalannu, avara jotegararannu mattu avaru (allahana horatu) yarannella aradhisuttiddaro avarannella ottu serisiri‘‘ –
